snippet.title: The Aztec ZeldaLike with the Coolest Combat
snippet.description:
Welcome to the latest chapter in my journey! What's been keeping me so long? Did the old game die??? Find out what's been going on!

Original Soundtrack Composed by artist Smokepincher, art and music video by Kai the Art Guy. Support us and download the full track! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2415590/Suns_Edge_Original_Soundtrack/

Discord Community: https://discord.gg/fhx7PSqUX2
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/KaitheArtGuy
Game Website: http://www.kcstudios.games/
Linktree: https://linktr.ee/Kai_The_Art_Guy

0:00 Intro
0:34 Who is this fluffy hair guy???
1:25 How to Receive Critical Feedback!
4:18 MAJOR Game Updates!!!
5:38 New Opening Chapter!
7:06 New Items & Debuffs!!!
8:22 Dealing with Feature Creep
10:21 What Comes Next???
11:18 The New Game Title!!!
12:01 Closing Thoughts:)

#gaming #indiegame #gamedev
